titleStmt.title: P. C. Hartnell et al. to James F. Robinson
CWG8934

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.repository: Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives
msIdentifier.collection: Office of the Governor, James F. Robinson: Governor's Official Correspondence File, Petitions for Pardons, Remissions, and Respites, 1862-1863

body.p:
Lexington Ky July 20th 1863
To His Excellency
Jas F. Robinson
Governor of the State of Ky

Your Petitioner John Driskell who has been fined Sixty Dollars for Selling Whisky by the Small hopes your Excellency will remit the Fine as your Petitioner has a large family dependent on his daily Labour

P, C, Hartnell
T. M. Bell
P, F, Maguire
F. S. Wilson
J. M. Downing Police No 2
D M Bell. --
W A Varty
Wm Murphy Marshall
James Reily
James Clark
E W Dowden

J F Robinson
$60 } Tipling
Jno Driskell
Issd July 22 1863.
